import React,{ useState } from 'react' const Rate = ({ ratevalue, rateChange }) => { const[value, setValue] = useState(ratevalue) const subHandler = (e) =>{ console.log(e.target.val) } return (
= 1 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 0.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > rateChange(2)}> = 2 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 1.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > rateChange(3)}> = 3 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 2.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > rateChange(4)}> = 4 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 3.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > rateChange(5)}> = 5 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 4.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } >
) } export default Rate
